title: Elizabeth City, North Carolina
summary: Elizabeth City is a city in Pasquotank County, North Carolina, in the United States. As of the 2010 census, it had a population of 18,683.[7] Elizabeth City is the county seat and largest city of Pasquotank County.[8] It is the cultural, economic and educational hub of the sixteen-county Historic Albemarle region of northeastern North Carolina.[9]
